title: You can save the error if you want to use it in the
rescue
c
clause

inline_content.Text: You can save the error if you want to use it in the

title:
def divide(x, y)
  begin
    x/y
  rescue => e
    puts "There was a %s (%s)" % [e.class, e.message]
    puts e.backtrace
  end
end

def divide(x, y)
  begin
    x/y
  rescue => e
    puts "There was a %s (%s)" % [e.class, e.message]
    puts e.backtrace
  end
end
